about_contribute.message: If you would like to report a problem or propose a new feature or help translate Flashcontrol, please submit a request.

about_engine.message: Flashcontrol is built with the Adblock Plus 1.11 filter engine.

allow_label.message: Allow websites to show Flash content

allow_session.message: Allow this site until you exit Chrome

choose_content.message: Let me choose when to allow Flash content (recommended)

description.message: Stay in control of Flash content

filter_syntax.message: Flashcontrol uses the Adblock PlusÂ® filter syntax. To learn more about Adblock Plus (ABP) and the syntax visit these links:

filters_added.message: Create a filter that allows or blocks content by matching patterns in its address.

flash_count.message: Show number of Flash Players in the Chrome omnibox

menu_icon.message: Show green omnibox icons for 'Allowed' sites

omnibox_desc.message: Give sites permission to show Flash content.

reblock_buttons.message: Add a 'Close' button to each Flash Player

reblock_desc.message: Block content that you don't want to see.

run_content.message: Allow all sites to show Flash content

whitelist_url.message: Add an address so Flash can load the next time you visit the site.
